ygData.subject: Re: Ideas...
ygData.msgSnippet: I know this was mentioned before but in akanon there is that star thing floating above the pedestal.They re all over but the one near guide one across from the
ygData.messageBody:
I know this was mentioned before but in akanon there is that star thing
floating above the pedestal.They re all over but the one near guide one
across from the palace doesnt move .When you click on it it turns and it
sounds as if a door is opening.It stays turned for a bout 10 seconds and then
turns back .I havent had much chance to look around after clicking it mainly
because I didnt have anyone to help me ,but mi sure that this must be
something of importance.I am on Bertoxx and i know there are a lot of people
on this list als on Bertoxx so if anone wants to try and figure out what this
thing is just give me a tell.


Xalumkin of Bertoxx
